content.prompt: One way in which immigration policy in the 1960s differed from immigration policy enacted in the 1920s was that legislation in the 1960s

choices.label: imposed a ban on immigration from Asia
loosened restrictions on immigration on the basis of national origin
established limits on the number of immigrants allowed in the country
barred immigration from Eastern European countries

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
